message.content:
cs.DM, cs.CC, cs.CG, cs.GT, cs.DS

Reasoning: The problem of coloring a grid with specific constraints falls under the category of discrete mathematics (cs.DM). The fact that the problem is NP-hard suggests that it may also belong to the categories of computational complexity (cs.CC), computational geometry (cs.CG), graph theory (cs.GT), and data structures and algorithms (cs.DS).
